color-families.name: color-families
color-families.description: 4 color palettes keyed by direction: blue (up), green (down), orange (left), purple (right). Each has 6 hex shades from lightest to darkest. Pure data module — no imports, no side effects, no DOM. Used by shade-cycling and copy-color features. @files colors.js, store.js, spinner.js

keyboard-controls.name: keyboard-controls
keyboard-controls.description: Arrow keys set direction, Space toggles stop/start, Escape resets. Keydown listener on document with preventDefault to block scroll. KEY_MAP translates ArrowUp/Down/Left/Right to direction strings. @files spinner.js, store.js

directional-spin.name: directional-spin
directional-spin.description: Button click handlers call store.setDirection(). Subscribe callback adds/removes spin-* CSS class and toggles .active on the clicked button.

stop-start.name: stop-start
stop-start.description: Stop button pauses if spinning. Start button resumes if paused and direction exists. Subscribe callback toggles .paused class.

speed-control.name: speed-control
speed-control.description: Range input (0.5–5) calls store.setSpeed(). Subscribe callback updates --spin-duration CSS property and syncs slider value.

copy-color.name: copy-color
copy-color.description: Click handler on .circle calls store.copyCurrentColor(), writes hex to clipboard via navigator.clipboard.writeText(). 1200ms timeout clears feedback. Subscribe callback toggles .copied class and updates hint text.

shade-cycling.name: shade-cycling
shade-cycling.description: Updates --spinner-color CSS property when colorFamily or shadeIndex changes. The @property registration in CSS enables smooth animated transitions between shade values.

status-hud.name: status-hud
status-hud.description: Live status display showing current direction, color family name, shade position (N/total), and speed. Updates on every state change. Monospace font, muted colors. @files spinner.js, style.css, index.html

reset.name: reset
reset.description: Restores all state to initial defaults. Clears direction, stops spinning, resets color family, shade, speed, and copied color. Triggered by Escape key. @files store.js, spinner.js

3d-scene.name: 3d-scene
3d-scene.description: 3D perspective container with preserve-3d. perspective: 800px creates the depth illusion. The circle inside rotates on X or Y axis depending on direction. border-radius: 50% + radial-gradient + box-shadow create the glowing orb effect. @files style.css, index.html

reduced-motion.name: reduced-motion
reduced-motion.description: Respects prefers-reduced-motion: disables all spin animations for users who've configured reduced motion in their OS. The circle still changes colors and responds to controls, just doesn't rotate. @files style.css

responsive-layout.name: responsive-layout
responsive-layout.description: Mobile breakpoint at 600px: smaller scene (220px) and circle (180px), narrower grid, smaller buttons, wrapped HUD, hidden keyboard hints. Speed slider narrower (160px). @files style.css
